title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
Prerequisite: Programming and Data Structures
Syllabus: Computer structure, data representation, instruction format, assembly language, addressing systems. Macrolanguage and macroprocessors, concepts and design of assemblers, loaders, linkage editors.
